column2: Appointment of a new deputy commander of the faction's detachment
Appoint a new deputy squad leader to replace the old one. The deputy's bonuses begin to apply from the moment of appointment.
The deputy commander of a faction's squad provides additional bonuses and influences the entire faction.
A new deputy commander has been appointed for the faction's detachment: %s
The sum of all bonuses and penalties from the faction's squad leader, deputy, internal faction rules, ideology, buildings, improvements, and terrain.

A major emission occurred in the Zone. Mutants became more active and appeared to be on the verge of a rampage. Our soldiers successfully survived the emission, but even in shelters they struggled, so the following amount of medical supplies were used:

A major emission occurred in the Zone. Mutants became more active and appeared to be on the verge of a rampage. Some soldiers were unable to survive the emission due to a shortage of medical supplies, which they were forced to use even in shelters.
